content: Search Free Trial Get Demo Data443 vs Titus Fortra Comparing Data Classification Solutions Company Overview Titus provides data protection solutions, aiding businesses worldwide in data security. Their offerings help organizations with the identification, classification, protection, analysis, and dissemination of information, aiding in meeting regulatory compliance. Equipped with a policy manager, Titus bolsters existing security frameworks and serves a broad range of users. The company is noted for its contribution to data compliance and security, catering to various sectors including finance, manufacturing, government, and others.
